SQL.LOAD: SELECT transaction_log_header_id, item_number, response, response_detail, xml_claim_number, xml_service_order_number, xml_external_item_code, xml_in_home_visit_date, xml_visit_date, xml_defect_reason, xml_technical_report, xml_labor, xml_trip_amount, xml_expected_repair_date, xml_quotation_date, xml_claim_status, xml_repair_date, xml_shipping, xml_pickup_date, xml_e_ticket, xml_collect_date, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id FROM elp_trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita WHERE trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id = :trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita SET transaction_log_header_id = :transaction_log_header_id, item_number = :item_number, response = :response, response_detail = :response_detail, xml_claim_number = :xml_claim_number, xml_service_order_number = :xml_service_order_number, xml_external_item_code = :xml_external_item_code, xml_in_home_visit_date = :xml_in_home_visit_date, xml_visit_date = :xml_visit_date, xml_defect_reason = :xml_defect_reason, xml_technical_report = :xml_technical_report, xml_labor = :xml_labor, xml_trip_amount = :xml_trip_amount, xml_expected_repair_date = :xml_expected_repair_date, xml_quotation_date = :xml_quotation_date, xml_claim_status = :xml_claim_status, xml_repair_date = :xml_repair_date, xml_shipping = :xml_shipping, xml_pickup_date = :xml_pickup_date, xml_e_ticket = :xml_e_ticket, xml_collect_date = :xml_collect_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id = :trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id
